description: Synology Drive Client - desktop utility for Synology Drive (official Synology client).
notes: This manifest installs the Synology Drive Client MSI (64-bit).
Autoupdate/checkver use the Synology archive index to find latest versions.

uninstall.script: if ($psversiontable.PSVersion.Major -lt 6) { $prog = Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_Product | Where-Object { $_.Name -like 'Synology Drive Client*' } } else { $prog = Get-CimInstance -ClassName Win32_Product | Where-Object { $_.Name -like 'Synology Drive Client*' } }; if ($prog) { Start-Process msiexec -Wait -ArgumentList '/x', $prog.IdentifyingNumber, '/qn', '/norestart' } else { Write-Output 'Synology Drive Client not found via Win32_Product; trying registry MSI Uninstall key'; $u = Get-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\*','HKLM:\SOFTWARE\WOW6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\*' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.DisplayName -like 'Synology Drive Client*' }; if ($u) { foreach ($i in $u) { if ($i.PSChildName) { Start-Process msiexec -Wait -ArgumentList '/x', $i.PSChildName, '/qn', '/norestart' } } } else { Write-Warning '卸载失败：未找到 Synology Drive Client 安装记录' } }
